titles.title: Making melody in my heart to You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm making melody in my heart to You
I'm making melody in my heart to You
Pouring out Your praise
With everything within

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm making melody in my heart You
I'm making melody in my heart You
Your will always be the song i love to sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How can hearts not love Your name?
How can souls not sing Your praise?
Jesus, You've put music in my soul
